meanings.sent1: The shrills of the birds woke me up early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The shrills of the ambulance siren could be heard from far away.
meanings.sent3: The shrills of the teapot made it seem like it was singing a tiny song.
meanings.sent4: The shrills of the wind through the trees sounded like nature's own music.
meanings.sent5: The shrills of the whistle signaled the end of the game with a sharp note.

meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched and piercing sound
meanings.sent1: The cat shrills when it sees a mouse in the house.
meanings.sent2: The kettle shrills when the water inside starts boiling.
meanings.sent3: The child shrills with excitement when they see their favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The wind shrills through the cracks in the window on a stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The singer shrills the high notes with perfect pitch during the performance.
